ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Proposal to change how bard haste songs stack with  enchanter/sham an haste spells
ygData.msgSnippet: A touch of sarcasm on the Lullaby comment?  :)  I think you ll be surprised.  I was playing a lower (20s) level Bard when the thing was nerfed, and honestly, I
ygData.messageBody:
A touch of sarcasm on the Lullaby comment? :) I think you'll be surprised. I was playing a lower (20s)
level Bard when the thing was nerfed, and honestly, I had no clue what all the higher level Bards were
complaining about. The song's designed to work pretty well at the level you get it, and given the
relative mob/pc power at that level, it's a pretty nice song. For awhile.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk



JESSICA_WEBBER@... wrote:

> Hally/Tani wrote:
> ...bards go through
> their "bad, weak period" very early - say around levels 9-22...
>
> Heh, and I'm at the peak of the bad, week period. This level I got
> Cataloging Libretto! Woohoo! Next level I get Lullaby!! Woohoo!! ;^)
